D508切换成双卡DSDA版本修改方法

AP修改:

adb shell setprop persist.radio.multisim.config dsda

NV修改:

NV 70266 to DSDA

NV 6876 → dual_Standby_pref to 5

NV 6907 to 1

NV 67256 to 0

NV 70210 hw_config.UIM[1].DISABLE_UIM to FALSE

D508切换成单卡SS版本修改方法

AP修改:

delete如下property

adb shell setprop persist.radio.multisim.config xxxx

NV修改:

NV04398 →1

NV6876 → 0 0 0 0 0x05

NV6907 → 0

NV70266 → 0

NV70210 hw_config.UIM[1].DISABLE_UIM to TRUE
